column4: hi all. do i need the virtualbox-ose-modules, if ubuntu is the host system? or is that package required to provide certain host capabilites for ubuntu?
- is required. must match kernel version. maybe you will want to keep older kernels, because the modules arent always available for the newest kernel (you can still compile them yourself)
yeah.. i actually asked because of the fact, that sometimes the newest kernel version is missing.. thanks a lot for the info
